'''Fatuous Farce''' is a weekly [[Reputation Request]] that occurs in [[Inazuma]].

==Steps==
{{Quest Description|The [[Fatui]] are up to no good in Kannazuka. [[Katayama]] hopes that someone can stop them.}}
#Defeat the Fatui

==Request Details==
===Request from Katayama===
Help Needed:<br />
The suspicious types hanging out around Kannazuka are growing by the day...<br />
As if this place wasn't chaotic enough already, we now have these guys coming in. What trouble are they trying to cause?<br />
Just thinking about it gives me the shakes. If some heroic soul could drive them off, that would be great!
